title: Disconnection without a reason
body: I have had this problem twice: I am playing ranked and out of nowhere my connection goes down without reason, but the internet still continues to give on the pc and in my other devices only in the game it does not. I waited 5 minutes and did not reconnect. After that I tried to leave the game and re-enter but I could not. My client was like as if the game had never happened. I had not lost LP nor was there any game in match history, I could even start another ranked. This problem happened twice and I wanted to know what to do.

replies.body: Yeeeaaa it sounds like you ran into a game that crashed entirely on the server. When that happens, everyone else is disconnected as well and nobody gets any kind of penalties for it.
